name: 林顯聖
objective: 本課程內容包括控制閥、控制器之介紹，程序動態應答分析，閉環路控制系統分析，控制器調諧，頻率應答分析及串級控制系統之介紹
schedule:
1-2週 緒論
3-4週 控制閥特性
5-6週 控制器特性
7-10週 程序動態應答分析
11-13週 閉環路控制系統動態應答分析與控制器調諧
14-16週 頻率應答分析
17-18週 程序控制系統
scorePolicy:
二次期中考與期末考 - 80%~90%
作業與平時考核 - 10%~20%
(平均成績如果未超過學校規定上限，
作業與平時考核佔20%，超過則調整
比例至滿足要求)
materials:
Textbook
1. Seborg, D. E., Edgar, T. F., Mellichamp D. A., and Doyle III, F. J."Process Dynamics and Control," 3rd edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc. (2011)
2. 林顯聖,"程序控制講義",2012年2月修訂版(2012)
Reference Book:
1. Smith, C. A. and Corripio, A. B., "Principles and Practical of Automatic Process Control", 3rd edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc. (2006)
2. Luyben, W. L. and Luyben, M. L., "Essentials of Process Control", McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1997)
3. Riggs, J. B. and Karim, M. N., "Chemical and Bio-Process Control", 3rd edition, Pearson Education, Inc. (2006)
4. Luyben, W. L., "Process Modeling, Simulation and Control For Chemical Engineers", 2nd edition, McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1990)
5. Marlin, T. E., "Process Control : Designing Processes and Control Systems for Dynamic Performance", McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1995)
6. LeBlanc, S. F., and  Coughanowr, D. R., "Process Systems Analysis and Control", 3rd edition, McGraw-Hill , Inc. (2009)
7. Shinskey, F. G., "Process Control System", 4th edition, McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1996)
